about_the_game:
The international group IVECO also marketed its buses under the name Irisbus until 2022. Irisbus was once a joint venture between IVECO and Renault's commercial vehicle division. Numerous model series were thus launched under the Irisbus brand.

The Irisbus Evadys is a perfect model for use on country roads, airport shuttle services, travel and excursions. It is a real expert in terms of versatility. Extra comfortable reclining passenger seats, passenger lighting and individual air supply, standard air conditioning, tables with cup holders - this bus is made for comfortably transporting your passengers to their desired destination.

This model series has now found its way into OMSI 2, the bus simulator. It can be used as an airport bus, but also for intercity traffic. The Evadys is a real multi-purpose coach and multi-talent and is included in two variants in this OMSI vehicle expansion.

Evadys H
This model series is intended for regional regular services and is also used in shuttle services.

Evadys HD
These vehicles are intended for excursions and short trips and have been equipped with a larger luggage compartment. The extended storage space under the passenger cabin offers enough room for a lot of luggage.

Features:
  • Versatile models
  • H and HD versions
  • Authentic design
  • Real sounds
  • Versatile SETVARs
  • Repaints to popular free and payware maps
  • Easy to create repaints

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core, e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 1,024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

English, German*, French
